Posts.Content: Sharon1224 wrote: I am scheduled to begin taking Taxotere/Carboplatin/Herceptin on Friday October 10th.  I will be doing 6 rounds of Taxotere/Carboplatin once every 3 weeks with Herceptin every week until finished with the Taxotere/Carboplatin then I will have Herceptin once every 3 weeks until October 2009. I also had a bi-lateral mastectomy with reconstruction - I have had two expansions already and will probably get two more. Can anyone help me with what to expect and some tips on how to handle side effects?   I have made an an appointment to get a wig.  With the holiday period around the corner I really want to be able to participate so any guidance would be greatly appreciated. Sharon Dx 7/30/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/0 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
